title: Relates to qualifcations of superintendents; repealer
summary: Repeals certain provisions of the education law relating to qualifications of superintendents.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2849

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   February 2, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  PARKER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to repeal subdivision 3 of section 3003  of  the  education  law,
         relating to qualifications of superintendents

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 3 of section  3003  of  the  education  law  is
    2  REPEALED.
    3    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.








        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06095-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 3 of section 3003 of the education law, relating to qualifications of superintendents
